questions.quote: Because I like this one!  C'mon, let's go. Let's go!  Oh, hi..
Oh it's a thing where they auction off dates with bachelors for charity.
You know, you oughta go down there and help him out. He's a widower.
You're really helping me out with this, buddy. Kids are gonna be so thrilled.
Jerry, come on. If my mother keeps shrinking, this is exactly what she's gonna look like in ten years!
Hey who's your barber, eh? You tell the joke, I cut the hair.
All right, don't panic. Let's just decide now. Which one do you want?
I don't know how we did it, but there's some kind of chemistry between us, we turned out one hell of a catalog.
Yeah, she was on his right side. He can't make a move with his left hand. Can't go left.
Well, I'm sorry. I gave you gonorrhea because I thought you'd have fun with it.
